name: Bureau of Inverse Technology (B.I.T.)
biography:
B.I.T. is a real organization formed in 1992 existing in geographic dislocation (Melbourne, San Francisco and Berlin) which is engaged in the ongoing distance-operation of B.I.T. experimentation and other technological diversions. B.I.T. questions the safety of the corporate imagination and its design upon our technological futures

References:
Suicide Box, 1996, 13:00 min, color, sound
